title: Moderate: flatpak-builder security and bug fix update
description:
Flatpak-builder is a tool for building flatpaks from sources.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Additional Changes:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.7 Release Notes linked from the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2022-21682 is retrieved from Red Hat
